SELECT ATTENDANCE_NO, EMP_NO, CLOCK_IN, CLOCK_OUT, TRUNC(CLOCK_IN) AS WORKDAY, STATUS, CASE WHEN CLOCK_OUT IS NOT NULL THEN FLOOR((CLOCK_OUT - CLOCK_IN) * 24) || '시간 ' || FLOOR(MOD((CLOCK_OUT - CLOCK_IN) * 24 * 60, 60)) || '분' ELSE NULL END AS WORKTIME FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY ATTENDANCE_NO DESC
SELECT a.ATTENDANCE_NO, a.EMP_NO, m.MEM_NAME AS EMP_NAME, a.CLOCK_IN, a.CLOCK_OUT, TRUNC(a.CLOCK_IN) AS WORKDAY, a.STATUS, CASE WHEN a.CLOCK_OUT IS NOT NULL THEN FLOOR((a.CLOCK_OUT - a.CLOCK_IN) * 24) || '시간 ' || FLOOR(MOD((a.CLOCK_OUT - a.CLOCK_IN) * 24 * 60, 60)) || '분' ELSE NULL END AS WORKTIME FROM ATTENDANCE a JOIN MEMBER m ON a.EMP_NO = m.EMP_NO WHERE m.STORE_ID = #{storeId} AND TO_CHAR(a.CLOCK_IN, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND m.POSITION = 'employee' ORDER BY a.ATTENDANCE_NO DESC
UPDATE attendance SET clock_in = #{clockIn}, clock_out = #{clockOut}, status = #{status} WHERE attendance_no = #{attendanceNo}

INSERT INTO ATTENDANCE ( ATTENDANCE_NO, EMP_NO, CLOCK_IN, STATUS ) VALUES ( ATTENDANCE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{empNo}, #{clockIn}, #{status} )

SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND CLOCK_OUT IS NULL AND TRUNC(CLOCK_IN) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
